properties.name: 1) The Old Monk
properties.description: Posted by Slowstudies2847 North Henderson Avenue Dallas TX[I] There’s / a man at your window / with his hair on fire. / Yes, I said-- / there\'s this old man / at your window / and his hair is an arsonist. / If you don\'t shut your window / girl / I do believe / your house is going to choke on itself.

properties.name: 10) Lota's Goat
properties.description: Posted by Slowstudies7248 Gaston Avenue Dallas TX[IV] The lists you never read to me, I spied them. / They were tabulated on / the backsides of paper dolls.

properties.name: 11) The Lakewood Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Slowstudies6326 La Vista Drive Dallas TX[I] Vows fetal / in their exhaustion wait out / the night. / Down / by the riverside, a bathtub / is not a bed. / E-sharp / is not a key / I care to end in.

properties.name: 12) Ship's Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Slowstudies1613 Greenville Avenue Dallas TX[V] I don\'t know but I\'ve been told: / you walk in the shadows / and sleep all in glare.

properties.name: 2) Cross Bar
properties.description: Posted by Slowstudies5334 Lemmon Avenue Dallas TX[IV] Owls roost in your eyebrows.

properties.name: 3) Rumorz
properties.description: Posted by Slowstudies2525 Wycliff Avenue Dallas TX[I] Your taste / for smoke thrashes its long slow / crocodile body through mires / of yellow mint.

properties.name: 4) The Sapphire Room
properties.description: Posted by Slowstudies3910 Maple Avenue Dallas TX[I] The children / will schoolbooks on their breasts, / when they have to pass / the refinery, they / want your name.

properties.name: 5) Phat Catz Bar & Grill
properties.description: Posted by Slowstudies4222 West Camp Wisdom Road Dallas TX[IV] The words you rouged / and sprinkled / with the eau de toilette of practice / slapped down the words / you committed to memory.

properties.name: 6) The Ritz Starlight Room
properties.description: Posted by Slowstudies2321 West Jefferson Street Dallas TX[IV] Must I holler? / Chess is / a dance of angles whose / beat wants / no rushing. / Must I?

properties.name: 7) Lee Harvey's
properties.description: Posted by Slowstudies1807 Gould Street Dallas TX[I] Your mother\'s cheshire eyes are sunk / as deep as / the shroud of a Christ. But she never witnessed / what menageries / escaped from her candy-shuttered pantry.

properties.name: 8) Reno's Chop Shop Saloon
properties.description: Posted by Slowstudies 210 Crowdus Street Dallas TX[I] Lordy, oh Lord—/ you gave me a roof, fair girl, / and a few beds. You fed me fish / fresh from the sea and poured coffee / from your free groceries. / You gave me your siblings and a pop quiz. You took off / your two-tone shoes and you told me, / "That\'s a good place for it. / Go get it, go get it." I walked / so many miles / in the tall, wide air of the musuem hall / and left the silence in the cabinet / where I found it. / Lordy, Lordy, Lord. / I wish I could / tell you what I\'d rather / have had.

properties.name: 9) Olga's
properties.description: Posted by Slowstudies4842 East Grand Avenue Dallas TX[V] Down through the years, / you will break the iron of many hammers / on the anvil of your proclivities.
